item.title: A big part of the economy grew faster in August, ISM finds, but not because everything is A-OK.
item.description: ISM services index hits 6-month high. Businesses aim to beat tariffs ahead of holiday season.

item.title: Gold’s breakout moment is terrible for your 401(k). Here’s what you can do about it.
item.description: It isn’t so hard to break up with the U.S. dollar, after all. These are 3 steps you can take.

item.title: $5,000 gold and other trades that Goldman, JPMorgan say may be coming if the market loses faith in the Fed
item.description: Investors should diversify into commodities as inflation concerns build

item.title: Is Honeywell a quantum-computing stock now? There’s a new link to Nvidia.
item.description: Nvidia’s VC arm was among the participants in a recently announced capital raise for Quantinuum, which is Honeywell’s quantum-computing business.

item.title: Jobless claims rise to highest level since June, adding to concerns about labor market
item.description: What worries policymakers is that the labor market tends to weaken quickly once layoffs commence.
